Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.objects.Message

extends java.lang.Object

      • photoAsync

        public Message photoAsync(java.lang.String photo)
        Attach photo to message

        Works slower that sync photo adding, but calling from execute

        Parameters:
        photo - Photo link: url, from disk or already uploaded to VK as photo{owner_id}_{id}

      • getCountOfAttachmentsByType

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getCountOfAttachmentsByType()
        Method helps to identify kind of message
        Returns:
        Map: key=type of attachment, value=count of attachments, key=summary - value=count of all attachments.
